summary: Charulatha S Kar as new Executive Director The Reserve Bank of India (RBI) has appointed Smt. Kar was serving as Chief General Manager-in-Charge in the Human Resource Management Department. Kar has experience of over three decades in the Reserve Bank having worked in areas of Payment and Settlement Systems, Information Technology, Government Banking, Internal accounts and Human Resource Management. She has represented the Reserve Bank in several Working Groups of BIS and has served as a member of other internal and external Committees. (Puneet Pancholy) Press Release -/ Chief General Manager ᮧेस ᮧकाशनी PRESS RELEASE भारतीय ᳯरज़वर् बᱹक RESERVE BANK OF INDIA वेबसाइट www.rbi.org.in/hindi संचार िवभाग, कᱶᮤीय कायार्लय, शहीद भगत ᳲसंह मागर्, फोटर्, मुंबई -   Website www.rbi.org.in Department of Communication, Central Office, Shahid Bhagat Singh Marg, Fort, ई-मेल/email helpdoc@rbi.org.in Mumbai -   फोन/Phone  -
